mapper.select: select ssa.id, ssa.spu_id, ssa.base_sale_attr_id, ssa.sale_attr_name, ssav.id as sale_attr_value_id, ssav.sale_attr_value_name from spu_sale_attr ssa inner join spu_sale_attr_value ssav on ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id and ssa.base_sale_attr_id = ssav.base_sale_attr_id where ssa.spu_id = #{spuId} and ssa.is_deleted = 0 and ssav.is_deleted = 0 order by ssa.id desc
